snippet: A federal judge in north Florida on Thursday struck down the state's gay marriage ban as unconstitutional, but stayed the ruling, leaving same-sex couples still unable to marry in the state....

headline.print_headline: Federal Judge Strikes Down Florida's Gay Marriage Ban, Stays Ruling
headline.main: Federal Judge Strikes Down Florida's Gay Marriage Ban, Stays Ruling

lead_paragraph: A federal judge in north Florida on Thursday struck down the state's gay marriage ban as unconstitutional, but stayed the ruling, leaving same-sex couples still unable to marry in the state.
